mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CALENDAR_EVENT(DAY, TITLE, CONTENT, COLOR) VALUES( #{day}, #{title}, #{content}, #{color})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, DAY, TITLE, CONTENT, COLOR FROM TB_CALENDAR_EVENT WHERE DAY LIKE CONCAT(#{currentYearMonth}, '%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CALENDAR_EVENT WHERE ID = #{ id }
